name: Lemon Bars
description: Simple instructions recipe and instructions for how to make lemon bars. This dessert has a shortbread base and a lemon meringue/curd filling.
instructions: Mix the 2 cups flour, 1/4 cup icing sugar and 1/4 cup sugar together in a bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the butter until it forms a shortbread consistency. Press the crust in a 13Ã—9 pan and bake in a 350F oven for 18-20 minutes. Using an electric mixer, beat the eggs with the 2 cups sugar until smooth. Add the lemon juice and zest. Separately mix the 4 tbsp flour with the baking powder. Beat that into the filling mixture. Pour the lemon filling over the crust and bake at 350F for 22-25 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. Chill in the fridge for at least an hour so that the squares cut easily. Dust with icing sugar and cut into squares.
